Command ⌘
Option ⌥
Shift ⇧
Control ⌃

<!-- TODO: catogary -->

| command | description                           |
| ------- | ------------------------------------- |
| ⌥ ⌘ ↓   | multi cursor down                     |
| ⌘ T     | find variable                         |
| ⇧ ⌥ O   | organize import(remove unused import) |
| ⇧ ⌥ ↑   | copy line up                          |
| ⇧ ⌥ ↓   | copy line down                        |
